title: Obama: U.S. Confident That Missile Came From Rebel-Held Region
teaser: The U.S. says that evidence suggests the missile that brought down Malaysia Airlines flight MH17 was fired from separatist-held territory in eastern Ukraine. NPR's Dina Temple-Raston reports what is now known about the crash.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
